Implementation of a container interface.

Headers
#include <iv/base.h>
#include <extit/base.h>
#include <extit/container.h>
#include <extit/container_impl.h>

Usage
typedef struct
{
         iv_version_t          version;  
} extit_container_t

The base container interface data. All containers share this common structure, which is used to determine the ABI version.

Members:
version - The interface version of the container.
Since:
ABI 1.0
typedef struct
{
         iv_version_t          version;  
         extit_container_ops_1_0_t *          ops;  
} extit_container_1_0_t

The version 1.0 container interface data.

Members:
version - The interface version of the container.
ops - The container interface operations.
Version:
ABI 1.0
Since:
ABI 1.0
typedef struct
{
         void *          (*op_get_symbol)(const extit_container_1_0_t * container, const char * name);  
         extit_func_t          (*op_get_function)(const extit_container_1_0_t * container, const char * name);  
         void *          (*op_get_interface)(const extit_container_1_0_t * container, const char * iid, iv_version_t version);  
         iv_version_t          (*op_query_interface)(const extit_container_1_0_t * container, const char * iid, iv_version_t base_version);  
         void          (*op_log)(const extit_container_1_0_t * container, const char * message);  
} extit_container_ops_comp_1_0_t

The version 1.0 container interface operations component.

Members:
op_get_symbol - Get a raw named symbol address.
op_get_function - Get a raw named function address.
op_get_interface - Get a named interface object by version.
op_query_interface - Query the supported version of an interface.
op_log - Log a simple message.
Version:
ABI 1.0
Since:
ABI 1.0
typedef struct
{
         extit_container_ops_comp_1_0_t          v0;  
} extit_container_ops_1_0_t

The version 1.0 container interface operations.

Members:
v0 - The x.0 component.
Version:
ABI 1.0
Since:
ABI 1.0
